summary.span: 一个容器时间线，该时间线为子动画提供对象和属性确定信息。

span.span: A container timeline that provides object and property targeting information for its child animations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 以交互方式控制情节提要Interactively Controlling Storyboards 可控制的情节提要可以暂停、恢复、查找、停止和删除。A controllable storyboard can pause, resume, seek, stop, and be removed. 若要使 storyboard 能够控制标记，请指定创建该情节提要的 对象的 属性;有关示例，请参阅[如何：在演示图板启动之后使用事件触发器控制情节提要](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-use-event-triggers-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md)。To make a storyboard controllable in markup, you specify the property of the object that creates it; for an example, see [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-use-event-triggers-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md). 若要使 storyboard 能够控制代码，必须使用情节提要的 方法的适当重载，并指定 `true` 使其可控制。To make a storyboard controllable in code, you must use the appropriate overload of the storyboard's method and specify `true` to make it controllable. 有关示例，请参阅[如何：在演示图板启动后对其进行控制](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md)。For an example, see [How to: Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md). ## 数据绑定和动画处理时间线Data Binding and Animating Timelines 大多数时间线属性可以是数据绑定的或动态的;但是，由于计时系统的工作方式，数据绑定或动画时间线的行为与其他数据绑定或动画对象的行为不同。Most timeline properties can be data bound or animated; however, because of the way the timing system works, data bound or animated timelines do not behave like other data bound or animated objects. 若要了解其行为，有助于理解激活时间线的方式。To understand their behavior, it helps to understand what it means to activate a timeline. 激活时间线时，将生成时间线及其子时间线。When a timeline is activated, copies are made of the timeline and its child timelines. 这些副本会被冻结（变为只读），并从它们创建 对象。These copies are frozen (made read-only) and objects are created from them. 这些时钟将执行对目标属性进行动画处理的实际工作。These clocks do the actual work of animating the targeted properties. 如果时间线是数据绑定的或动态的，则在创建其时钟时，将生成其当前值的快照。If a timeline is data bound or animated, a snapshot of its current values is made when its clock is created. 即使原始时间线可能会继续更改，时钟也不会更改。Even though the original timeline might continue to change, its clock does not. 对于反映数据绑定或动画更改的时间线，必须重新创建其时钟。For a timeline to reflect data binding or animation changes, its clock must be re-created. 不会自动为您重新创建时钟。Clocks are not re-created for you automatically. 以下是应用时间线更改的几种方法：The following are several ways to apply timeline changes: - 如果时间线是或属于 ，则可以通过使用 或 方法重新应用它的情节提要，使其反映更改。If the timeline is or belongs to a , you can make it reflect changes by reapplying its storyboard using a or the method. 这还会产生重新启动动画的附带影响。This has the side effect of also restarting the animation. 在代码中，可以使用 方法将演示图板前进到其之前的位置。In code, you can use the method to advance the storyboard back to its previous position. - 如果使用 方法将动画直接应用到属性，请再次调用 方法并向其传递已修改的动画。If you applied an animation directly to a property using the method, call the method again and pass it the animation that has been modified. - 如果正在直接使用时钟级别，请创建并应用新的时钟集，并使用它们来替换以前创建的时钟集。If you are working directly at the clock level, create and apply a new set of clocks and use them to replace the previous set of created clocks. 有关数据绑定动画的示例，请参阅[主要曲线动画示例](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160011)。For an example of a data bound animation, see [Key Spline Animation Sample](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160011) .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 将 、或 应用到属性时，以前与该属性关联的任何 对象将继续使用系统资源;计时系统不会自动删除这些时钟。When you apply a , , or to a property using the , any objects previously associated with that property continue to consume system resources; the timing system does not remove these clocks automatically. 为了避免在使用 应用大量时钟时出现性能问题，应在完成后从动画属性中删除组合时钟。To avoid performance issues when you apply a large number of clocks using , you should remove composing clocks from the animated property after they complete. 删除时钟有多种方法。There are several ways to remove a clock. - 若要从属性中删除所有时钟，请使用动画对象的 或 方法。To remove all clocks from a property, use the or method of the animated object. 指定正在进行动画处理的属性作为第一个参数，并 `null` 为第二个参数。Specify the property being animated as the first parameter, and `null` as the second. 这将从属性中移除所有动画时钟。This removes all animation clocks from the property. - 若要从时钟列表中删除特定 ，请使用 的 属性检索 ，然后调用 的 方法。To remove a specific from a list of clocks, use the property of the to retrieve a , then call the method of the . 通常在时钟的 事件处理程序中完成此操作。This is typically done in the event handler for a clock. 请注意，只能通过 来控制根时钟;子时钟的 属性返回 `null`。Note that only root clocks can be controlled by a ; the property of a child clock returns `null`. 另请注意，如果时钟的有效持续时间是永久性的，则不会调用 事件。Note also that the event is not called if the effective duration of the clock is forever. 在这种情况下，用户必须确定何时调用 。In that case, the user must determine when to call . 此动画问题主要出现在生存期较长的对象上。This is primarily an issue for animations on objects that have a long lifetime. 当对对象进行垃圾回收时，还会断开其时钟的连接并对其进行垃圾回收。When an object is garbage collected, its clocks are also disconnected and garbage collected. 有关时钟对象的详细信息，请参阅[动画和计时系统概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md)。For more information about clock objects, see [Animation and Timing System Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md). ## Examples 下面的示例使用 在用户鼠标左键时进行动画处理，当用户右键单击时， 。The following example uses the to animate when the user left-clicks, and the when the user right-clicks. [!code-csharp[StoryboardBeginAnimation_procedural_snip#FrameworkContentElementStoryboardWithHandoffBehaviorExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StoryboardBeginAnimation_procedural_snip/CSharp/FrameworkContentElementStoryboardWithHandoffBehaviorExample.cs#frameworkcontentelementstoryboardwithhandoffbehaviorexamplewholepage)] [!code-vb[StoryboardBeginAnimation_procedural_snip#FrameworkContentElementStoryboardWithHandoffBehaviorExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StoryboardBeginAnimation_procedural_snip/visualbasic/frameworkcontentelementstoryboardwithhandoffbehaviorexample.vb#frameworkcontentelementstoryboardwithhandoffbehaviorexamplewholepage)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果目标属性已进行动画处理，则使用指定的移交行为替换它们。If the targeted properties are already animated, they are replaced using the specified handoff behavior. 若要以交互方式控制此情节提要，必须在调用用于开始情节提要的交互式方法时指定相同的 `containingObject`To interactively control this storyboard, you must specify the same `containingObject` when calling the interactive methods that you used to begin the storyboard 调用此方法时，将为情节提要及其包含的任何时间线创建 对象。When this method is called, objects are created for the storyboard and any timelines it contains. 这些时钟与 `containingObject`存储在一起。These clocks are stored with `containingObject`. 开始情节提要将触发 和 事件。Beginning a storyboard triggers the and events. ## 使用撰写 HandoffBehaviorUsing the Compose HandoffBehavior 使用 将 、或 应用到属性时，以前与该属性关联的任何 对象将继续使用系统资源;计时系统不会自动删除这些时钟。When you apply a , , or to a property using the , any objects previously associated with that property continue to consume system resources; the timing system does not remove these clocks automatically. 为了避免在使用 应用大量时钟时出现性能问题，应在完成后从动画属性中删除组合时钟。To avoid performance issues when you apply a large number of clocks using , you should remove composing clocks from the animated property after they complete. 删除时钟有多种方法。There are several ways to remove a clock. - 若要从属性中删除所有时钟，请使用动画对象的 或 方法。To remove all clocks from a property, use the or method of the animated object. 指定正在进行动画处理的属性作为第一个参数，并 `null` 为第二个参数。Specify the property being animated as the first parameter, and `null` as the second. 这将从属性中移除所有动画时钟。This removes all animation clocks from the property. - 若要从时钟列表中删除特定 ，请使用 的 属性检索 ，然后调用 的 方法。To remove a specific from a list of clocks, use the property of the to retrieve a , then call the method of the . 通常在时钟的 事件处理程序中完成此操作。This is typically done in the event handler for a clock. 请注意，只能通过 来控制根时钟;子时钟的 属性返回 `null`。Note that only root clocks can be controlled by a ; the property of a child clock returns `null`. 另请注意，如果时钟的有效持续时间是永久性的，则不会调用 事件。Note also that the event is not called if the effective duration of the clock is forever. 在这种情况下，用户必须确定何时调用 。In that case, the user must determine when to call . 此动画问题主要出现在生存期较长的对象上。This is primarily an issue for animations on objects that have a long lifetime. 当对对象进行垃圾回收时，还会断开其时钟的连接并对其进行垃圾回收。When an object is garbage collected, its clocks are also disconnected and garbage collected. 有关时钟对象的详细信息，请参阅[动画和计时系统概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md)。For more information about clock objects, see [Animation and Timing System Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md). ## Examples 下面的示例使用可控情节提要对 进行动画处理。The following example uses a controllable storyboard to animate a . 包含在 的名称作用域内。The is contained within a 's name scope. [!code-csharp[StoryboardBeginAnimation_procedural_snip#FrameworkContentElementControlStoryboardExampleUsingWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StoryboardBeginAnimation_procedural_snip/CSharp/FrameworkContentElementControlStoryboardExample.cs#frameworkcontentelementcontrolstoryboardexampleusingwholepage)] [!code-vb[StoryboardBeginAnimation_procedural_snip#FrameworkContentElementControlStoryboardExampleUsingWholePage](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StoryboardBeginAnimation_procedural_snip/visualbasic/frameworkcontentelementcontrolstoryboardexample.vb#frameworkcontentelementcontrolstoryboardexampleusingwholepage)] 下一个示例使用 在用户单击鼠标左键时进行动画处理，当用户右键单击时，将使用 。The next example uses the to animate when the user left-clicks, and the when the user right-clicks. [!code-csharp[StoryboardBeginAnimation_procedural_snip#FrameworkContentElementStoryboardWithHandoffBehaviorExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StoryboardBeginAnimation_procedural_snip/CSharp/FrameworkContentElementStoryboardWithHandoffBehaviorExample.cs#frameworkcontentelementstoryboardwithhandoffbehaviorexamplewholepage)] [!code-vb[StoryboardBeginAnimation_procedural_snip#FrameworkContentElementStoryboardWithHandoffBehaviorExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StoryboardBeginAnimation_procedural_snip/visualbasic/frameworkcontentelementstoryboardwithhandoffbehaviorexample.vb#frameworkcontentelementstoryboardwithhandoffbehaviorexamplewholepage)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Pause() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 暂停与此 创建的 。

span.span: Pauses the that was created for this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将暂停情节提要，但如果它未处于活动状态或当前已暂停，则没有任何明显的效果。This method pauses the storyboard, but has no discernible effect if it is not active or currently paused. 作为副作用，所有关联的子级也会暂停。As a side effect, all associated children are also paused. 可控制的情节提要可以暂停、恢复、查找、停止和删除。A controllable storyboard can pause, resume, seek, stop, and be removed. 若要使 storyboard 能够控制代码，必须使用情节提要的 方法的适当重载，并指定 `true` 使其可控制。To make a storyboard controllable in code, you must use the appropriate overload of the storyboard's method and specify `true` to make it controllable. 有关示例，请参阅[如何：在演示图板启动后对其进行控制](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md)。For an example, see [How to: Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md). ## 开始暂停的情节提要Beginning a Paused Storyboard 当你 已暂停的情节提要时，它似乎会恢复并重新启动。When you a storyboard that was paused, it appears to resume and restart. 但是，这并不是实际发生的情况。However, that is not what actually happens. 方法实际将暂停的 替换为新的未暂停版本。The method actually replaces the paused with a new unpaused version. 每次调用 方法时，都会为情节提要创建时钟对象。Each time the method is called, clock objects are created for the storyboard. 这些时钟会分配给它们的动画属性。These clocks are distributed to the properties they animate. 因此，当再次调用 方法时，它不会重新启动其时钟;它将替换为新的时钟。So, when the method is called again, it does not restart its clocks; it replaces them with new clocks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将暂停情节提要，但如果它未处于活动状态或当前已暂停，则没有任何明显的效果。This method pauses the storyboard, but has no discernible effect if it is not active or currently paused. 作为副作用，所有关联的子级也会暂停。As a side effect, all associated children are also paused. 查找已暂停的情节提要不会将其恢复。Seeking a paused storyboard does not resume it. 恢复暂停的情节提要的唯一方法是使用 方法。The only way to resume a paused storyboard is to use the method. 再次调用 方法会将暂停的情节提要替换为新的情节提要，此方法具有恢复它的外观。Calling the method again replaces the paused storyboard with a new one, which has the appearance of resuming it. 若要以交互方式控制此情节提要，必须在调用用于开始情节提要的交互式方法时使用相同的 `containingObject` 参数。To interactively control this storyboard, you must use the same `containingObject` parameter when calling the interactive methods that you used to begin the storyboard. 可控制的情节提要可以暂停、恢复、查找、停止和删除。A controllable storyboard can pause, resume, seek, stop, and be removed. 若要使 storyboard 能够控制代码，必须使用情节提要的 方法的适当重载，并指定 `true` 使其可控制。To make a storyboard controllable in code, you must use the appropriate overload of the storyboard's method and specify `true` to make it controllable. 有关示例，请参阅[如何：在演示图板启动后对其进行控制](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md)。Fro an example, see [How to: Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md). 暂停演示图板的时钟会触发 事件。Pausing a storyboard's clock triggers the event. ## 开始暂停的情节提要Beginning a Paused Storyboard 当你 已暂停的情节提要时，它似乎会恢复并重新启动。When you a storyboard that was paused, it appears to resume and restart. 但是，这并不是实际发生的情况。However, that is not what actually happens. 方法实际上会自行替换为未暂停版本。The method actually replaces itself with an unpaused version. 每次调用 方法时，都会为情节提要创建时钟对象。Each time the method is called, clock objects are created for the storyboard. 这些时钟会分配给它们的动画属性。These clocks are distributed to the properties they animate. 因此，当再次调用 方法时，它不会重新启动其时钟;它将替换为新的时钟。So, when the method is called again, it does not restart its clocks; it replaces them with new clocks. ## Examples 下面的示例使用可控情节提要对 进行动画处理。The following example uses a controllable storyboard to animate a . 包含在 的名称作用域内。The is contained within a 's name scope. [!code-csharp[StoryboardBeginAnimation_procedural_snip#FrameworkContentElementControlStoryboardExampleUsingWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StoryboardBeginAnimation_procedural_snip/CSharp/FrameworkContentElementControlStoryboardExample.cs#frameworkcontentelementcontrolstoryboardexampleusingwholepage)] [!code-vb[StoryboardBeginAnimation_procedural_snip#FrameworkContentElementControlStoryboardExampleUsingWholePage](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StoryboardBeginAnimation_procedural_snip/visualbasic/frameworkcontentelementcontrolstoryboardexample.vb#frameworkcontentelementcontrolstoryboardexampleusingwholepage)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可控制的情节提要可以暂停、恢复、查找、停止和删除。A controllable storyboard can pause, resume, seek, stop, and be removed. 若要使 storyboard 能够控制代码，必须使用情节提要的 方法的适当重载，并指定 `true` 使其可控制。To make a storyboard controllable in code, you must use the appropriate overload of the storyboard's method and specify `true` to make it controllable. 有关示例，请参阅[如何：在演示图板启动后对其进行控制](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md)。For an example, see [How to: Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md). 在 上执行的所有交互式操作，因此也在 上，在计时引擎的下一计时周期发生，这会在下一次呈现之前发生。All interactive actions taken on a , and therefore also on a , occur on the next tick of the timing engine, which happens shortly before the next render. 这意味着，在此时间之前， 方法仍会影响动画属性。This means that the method still affects the animated properties until this time. 换句话说，下一次显示帧时，将删除该情节提要。In other words, the next time the frame is displayed, the storyboard is removed. 如果需要在此时间之前将动画与属性解除关联，请使用 方法，并将 `animation` 参数值 `null`。If you need to disassociate an animation from a property before this time, use the method with an `animation` parameter value of `null`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 恢复未暂停的情节提要不起作用。Resuming a storyboard that is not paused has no effect. 若要以交互方式控制此情节提要，必须在调用用于开始情节提要的交互式方法时使用相同的 `containingObject` 参数。To interactively control this storyboard, you must use the same `containingObject` parameter when calling the interactive methods that you used to begin the storyboard. 可控制的情节提要可以暂停、恢复、查找、停止和删除。A controllable storyboard can pause, resume, seek, stop, and be removed. 若要使 storyboard 能够控制代码，必须使用情节提要的 方法的适当重载，并指定 `true` 使其可控制。To make a storyboard controllable in code, you must use the appropriate overload of the storyboard's method and specify `true` to make it controllable. 有关示例，请参阅[如何：在演示图板启动后对其进行控制](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md)。For an example, see [How to: Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md). 查找已暂停的情节提要不会将其恢复。Seeking a paused storyboard does not resume it. 恢复暂停的情节提要的唯一方法是使用 方法。The only way to resume a paused storyboard is to use the method. 在情节提要启动后调用 方法将替换旧的情节提要，该情节提要具有恢复其外观的外观。Calling the method after the storyboard has started replaces the old storyboard, which has the appearance of resuming it. 恢复暂停的情节提要的时钟会触发 事件。Resuming a paused a storyboard's clock triggers the event. ## Examples 下面的示例使用可控情节提要对 进行动画处理。The following example uses a controllable storyboard to animate a . 包含在 的名称作用域内。The is contained within a 's name scope. remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 的 seeked 时间与上一个时钟周期对齐。 aligns the seeked time of the with the last clock tick. 值会立即更新，以反映 所做的更改，即使屏幕在屏幕更新之前不会反映这些更改。Values are immediately updated to reflect the changes due to , even though the screen does not reflect these changes until the screen updates. 请注意，查找操作不会考虑情节提要的 或 设置。Note that seek operations do not take the storyboard's or settings into account. 将该情节提要视为 1 且没有 的情况。The storyboard is treated as though it has a of 1 and no . 若要使 storyboard 能够控制代码，必须使用情节提要的 方法的适当重载，并指定 `true` 使其可控制。To make a storyboard controllable in code, you must use the appropriate overload of the storyboard's method and specify `true` to make it controllable. 有关示例，请参阅[如何：在演示图板启动后对其进行控制](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md)。For an example, see [How to: Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可控制的情节提要可以暂停、恢复、查找、停止和删除。A controllable storyboard can pause, resume, seek, stop, and be removed. 若要使 storyboard 能够控制代码，必须使用情节提要的 方法的适当重载，并指定 `true` 使其可控制。To make a storyboard controllable in code, you must use the appropriate overload of the storyboard's method and specify `true` to make it controllable. 有关示例，请参阅[如何：在演示图板启动后对其进行控制](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md)。For an example, see [How to: Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使情节提要的当前时间前进到其活动周期的结束时间;此时情节提要的行为由其 设置来指定。This method advances the storyboard's current time to the end of its active period; the storyboard's behavior at this point is specified by its setting. 如果 设置为 ，则情节提要将填充;如果该属性设置为 ，则情节提要将停止。If is set to , the storyboard fills; if the property is set to , the storyboard stops. 在持续时间无限的情节提要上调用此方法不会产生任何影响。Calling this method on a storyboard with an infinite duration, an infinite number of repetitions has no effect. 对非活动情节提要调用此方法不起任何作用。Calling this method on an inactive storyboard has no effect. 将时钟推进到其填充期会触发 和 事件。Advancing a clock to its fill period triggers the and events. 若要以交互方式控制此情节提要，必须在调用用于开始情节提要的交互式方法时使用相同的 `containingObject` 参数。To interactively control this storyboard, you must use the same `containingObject` parameter when calling the interactive methods that you used to begin the storyboard. 可控制的情节提要可以暂停、恢复、查找、停止和删除。A controllable storyboard can pause, resume, seek, stop, and be removed. 若要使 storyboard 能够控制代码，必须使用情节提要的 方法的适当重载，并指定 `true` 使其可控制。To make a storyboard controllable in code, you must use the appropriate overload of the storyboard's method and specify `true` to make it controllable. 有关示例，请参阅[如何：在演示图板启动后对其进行控制](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md)。For an example, see [How to: Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md). ## Examples 下面的示例使用可控情节提要对 进行动画处理。The following example uses a controllable storyboard to animate a . 包含在 的名称作用域内。The is contained within a 's name scope. remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此属性是可选的。Setting this property is optional. 如果未指定 ，演示图板的动画将应用于以下项之一：If the is not specified, a storyboard's animations are applied to one of the following: - 如果动画所属的情节提要是使用 启动的，则会以拥有触发情节提要的 操作的元素为目标。If the storyboard to which the animation belongs was started using a , the element that owns the action that triggers the storyboard is targeted. - 如果使用 方法启动了情节提要，则以 方法启动情节提要时指定的 或 为目标。If the storyboard was started using the method, the or specified when the storyboard was started with the method is targeted. 如果在具有子级的时间线上设置此属性，则这些子时间线会 "继承" 父级的 ，除非它们指定了自己的。When this property is set on a timeline with children, those child timelines "inherit" the parent's unless they specify their own. ## 使对象不再Making an Object Targetable 使用 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]时，可以执行以下两项操作之一，使不再的对象成为情节提要的一个对象：When using [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], you perform one of the following two actions to make an object targetable by a storyboard: - 如果对象是 或 ，请设置其 属性。If the object is a or a , set its property. - 如果对象是 或自定义 或 ，请使用[X：Name 指令](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-name-directive.md)标记扩展为其指定一个名称。If the object is a or a custom or , assign it a name using the [x:Name Directive](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-name-directive.md) markup extension. 使用代码时，通过使用 方法将对象指定为不再。When using code, you make an object targetable by using the method to assign the object a name. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|
